parallax.prompt: Fashion Rain - Close-up portrait of a woman, shoulders and face, shallow depth of field. Heavy rain falling in slow motion between the camera and the subject. Wet skin catching warm light. Blurred neon city lights reflecting on wet pavement in the far background. Slow subtle camera drift, anamorphic lens, cinematic, 24fps.

Sneaker Drop - Single high-end sneaker suspended mid-air, rotating slowly. Particles and dust motes catching volumetric light beams around it. Deep black background. The shoe is sharp in the foreground, particles drift at mid-depth, light beams recede into the far background. Slow orbit, cinematic lighting, 24fps.

Luxury Perfume - Glass perfume bottle on dark marble surface, wisps of golden mist drifting behind it. Blurred cityscape through floor-to-ceiling windows in the deep background. Shallow depth of field, warm studio lighting, slow subtle camera push-in. Cinematic, 24fps.

Canyon Car - Car hood and grille in sharp foreground, desert road stretching into red rock canyon walls. Heat haze distortion in the deep distance. Golden hour lighting, long shadows. Slow dolly forward, shallow depth of field, anamorphic lens, cinematic, 24fps.

Architectural Interior - Looking through a modern glass doorframe in the foreground into a sunlit open-plan living space. Floor-to-ceiling windows showing mountains beyond. Three clear depth layers. Slow gentle camera drift, natural light, shallow depth of field, cinematic, 24fps.

Cocktail Bar - Whiskey glass with a single ice sphere in sharp focus, backlit amber liquid catching warm light. Blurred moody bar interior behind it with bokeh lights glowing. Slow orbit around the glass, shallow depth of field, warm tones, cinematic lighting, 24fps.

Tech Product - Minimalist desk scene, glowing screen casting soft blue light on dark wood surface. Blurred background with green plants, warm amber desk lamp, bokeh lights. Shallow depth of field, rack focus, slow gentle parallax drift, cinematic color grading, 24fps, photorealistic.
